product_name: Sierra Designs Hurricane Rain Pants - Women's
long_description: Keep hiking in iffy weather in the women's Sierra Designs Hurricane Rain Pants, with their comfortable, built-in belt and waterproofing that withstands the hardest downpour. 100% nylon fabric features a waterproof polyurethane coating as well as a durable water repellent finish to bead up water so it rolls off. Elasticized waistband has an adjustable belt to fine-tune the fit. Articulated knees offer a comfortable fit and freedom of movement. Zippered leg openings for easy on/off have storm flaps to keep out the elements. Zippered thigh pocket holds hat or thin liner gloves. Pants pack into thigh pocket for easy stowing. The women's Sierra Designs Hurricane Rain Pants are cut to fit over light hiking pants or shorts.
short_description: Keep hiking in iffy weather in the women's Sierra Designs Hurricane Rain Pants, with their comfortable, built-in belt and waterproofing that withstands the hardest downpour.
